articles.description: Mendy, 27, who has been in custody for around seven weeks, was denied bail by Judge Patrick Thompson at a 50-minute hearing at Chester Crown Court, from which the media was excluded.
articles.content:
Premier League footballer Benjamin Mendy was today refused bail ahead of his trial for rape and sexual assault due to take place in three months time.
The 27-year-old Manchester City defender, who i… [+2329 chars]

articles.author: Kishan Vaghela
articles.title: Gareth Bale claims he is the 'No 1' golfer at Real Madrid - Daily Mail
articles.description: His association with golf has been magnified ever since he celebrated a Wales victory in November 2019 with his team-mates by showing a national flag with the words 'Wales. Golf. Madrid. In that order.'
articles.content:
Golf fanatic Gareth Bale insists he is the No 1 player at Real Madrid - but he has also revealed goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois is the only other club team-mate who competes with him.

articles.title: Former Liverpool star Gini Wijnaldum admits he's 'not completely happy' at PSG - Daily Mail
articles.description: Wijnaldum has not completed 90 minutes in PSG's last six Ligue 1 matches and had to make do with just 12 minutes against Manchester City in the Champions League last month.
articles.content:
Gini Wijnaldum has admitted he is 'not completely happy' at Paris Saint-Germain after failing to make his mark on the French giants since leaving Liverpool this summer.
